channel.title: EC2 on Richard Standow
channel.description: Recent content in EC2 on Richard Standow

item.title: Cloud Resume Challenge
item.description: What is a Cloud Resume? The Cloud Resume Challenge is a multiple step resume project which helps build and demonstrate skills fundamental to pursuing a career as an Cloud Engineer. The project was first published by Forrest Brazeal. who works at A Cloud Guru, a cloud education company. Linkdin Here are the steps I took with a complete breakdown Certification I have finished the AWS training for Practitioners, and Solutions Architect.

item.title: Hitechmadeez Website
item.description: HiTechMadeEZ.com HiTechMadeEz is a website I created that will provide a variety of resources to people and help educate friends and family members about using technology. I have changed my mind several times on how I want to approach this goal of education and whom is my audience. At first, I used AWS did a full-scale backend. Route 53 as my DNS, load balancer, EC2 LAMP stack then AMI image of Plesk, CloudFront, S3.
